messages.subject: Hi Everyone! I'm new to homeschooling and Unschooling!!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, Wow! What can I say, just when I thought I ve understood enough to make that all important decision to homeschool our 6 year old son, and then,
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone,

Wow! What can I say, just when I thought I've understood enough to
make that all important decision to homeschool our 6 year old son,
and then, when researching the all important "do I or do I not limit
the playstation?", I've stumbled into the "world of unschooling", a
totally different segment of homeschooling, only deeper! I like
what've I've read so far about unschooling, it makes sense to me as
I was one a little child too but it is too scary/radical for me as
mother, to accept??!! Strange how it all makes perfect sense to me
on one side but yet hard to let go on the other. But as always, for
me and my kid, common sense rules and wins all the time!

As for the playstation? Well, I've read enough to understand that it
can be educational too, and if we don't put time limit on it, it
won't be that 'unforbidden fruit' and will lose it's novelty
eventually, as did the tv and the pc!

Glad to have found your world and will be staying for a while.

With best regards,
SharonC
